item.title: Bitmap Font (GODOT)
item.description: drawing part [libresprite] Create 110x50 canvas pick color palette in presets menu, e.g Nes fill background a bit bright color e.g. #92d3ff make 8x8 square for each letter, number and character etc. and fill darker color e.g. #2000b2 we are ready to draw some letters on it you can download it here godot part extends Node2D # font texture const FONT_TEXTURE:Texture = preload("res://bitmap-font.png") # texture size const T_SIZE = {w=110,h=50} # project window size const WIND = {w=128,h=128} export(bool) var drw_grid = false onready var bitmap_font:BitmapFont = BitmapFont.
